=== Release Overview ===

* Schedule
** Natty Release: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/NattyReleaseSchedule
** Interlock Information: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/NattyReleaseInterlock
* Features
** Release Status: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ReleaseTeam/FeatureStatus
** Alpha 3 Work Items: http://people.canonical.com/~platform/workitems/natty/all-natty-beta.html

=== Actions Pending ===

* UDS BOF/Post Mortem
** [skaet] Rework release process pages to make explicit who/role, where and when; and apply refactoring (merging pages, checklist, etc. to make timeline not require back/forth linking). - IN PROGRESS. 
* 2010/12/10
** [skaet/ScottK] brainstorm with others on ways to help tackling the large number of linking failures backlog - IN PROGRESS
** [skaet] figure out a way of calling attention to wishlist bugs(per: http://www.uk.debian.org/Bugs/Developer#severities), that are actually feature dependencies between teams  (bug:56679, bug: 688142) - IN PROGRESS.  Probably will need to have discussions at next UDS though for resolution. 
* 2011/02/18
** [release team]  to revisit release freeze date, and its relation to beta 2 - TO DO
** [skaet] follow up with doko after he returns on Linaro toolchain inclusion. - DONE - we'll be including the march release.
